story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1101_0100_20:
Benga is on the attack, coming in
aggressively!
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Although they’re grandfather and grandson,
they battle very differently.
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Benga relies on strong, hard-hitting moves to
power through his opponents.
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_0400_10:
It’s impressive he was able to polish his
moves so much in such a short time.
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_0600_10: I sparred with him, so I know firsthand.
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_0700_10:
He has a lot of knowledge and experience...
But his strength is more than just that.
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_0800_10: I went through a LOT with Volcarona!
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_0900_10: I won’t even lose to you now, Gramps!
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1101_1000_20:
Benga’s unleashing a relentless barrage of
powerful moves!
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_1100_10: As you say, it looks like you’ve trained a lot.
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_1300_10: Heh! That won’t work on me!
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1101_1500_20: He’s at it again! This guy’s unstoppable!
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_1600_10:
To some, it might seem Master Alder’s being
pushed back.
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Yes, but he’s not actually the one being
cornered.
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_2300_10: Why are WE in a pinch?!
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_2400_10: It’s just like when I battled him.
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Alder slowly whittling down his
opponent’s stamina...
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Just because you get stronger, it doesn’t
mean your Pokémon does, too.
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_2800_10: And the same goes the other way!
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_3000_10:
What it truly means to walk toward the
future together with Pokémon...
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1101_3300_20: Can you believe it?! Alder has—
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_3400_10: I’m not done yet! Let’s go, Volcarona!
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_3500_10:
You’re not giving up until the very end!
Well done, Benga!
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_4100_10: We went through a lot, too, didn’t we?
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_4500_10: Your strength was different from ours.
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_4600_10: Have you calmed down a bit, Benga?
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_4700_10:
We both trained rigorously with our
Pokémon.
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_4900_10:
you only wanted to prove your strength,
and that led to some rash decisions, didn’t it.
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_5200_10:
What’s so important about reaching the top?
And what do you plan to do after Arceus
accepts you?
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_5300_10:
Why do you want to get stronger with
Volcarona?
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_5500_10:
Pokémon tend to follow their Trainer’s
wishes.
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_5600_10:
And sometimes, they push themselves
too hard.
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_5700_10:
As Trainers, we’re responsible for noticing
that.
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_5900_10:
I haven’t been treating Volcarona how I
should.
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_6000_10:
The reason I wanted to awaken my
arc suit...
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_6100_10:
was so I’d have the strength to keep
someone as talented as you from going
offtrack.
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_6200_10: I think my Volcarona felt the same.
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_6300_10:
He saw a younger Volcarona pushing itself
too hard, and he wanted to help. That’s why
he lent me his power.
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_6500_10:
I guess part of it was I didn’t want to lose
to my own grandson!
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_6900_10:
I think I’m starting to understand what you
mean when you talk about strength.
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_7200_10:
Well done, Volcarona! You’ve done a
great job.
story_arceus_04_10000/2401_1001_7600_10: (Your spirit will always live on with us.)
